definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
cause and effects (idiom); entire process of development

sentences.english: Nine younger sister listen to happy old man say that finish context, immediately agreed.
sentences.chinese: 九妹聽神醫老人說完前因後果，立即點頭答應。

sentences.english: After careful investigation，he got to know the ins and outs of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 經過仔細的調查，他終於弄清了事件的前因後果。

sentences.english: The play the causes and effects of logical relationship is roughly such.
sentences.chinese: 這齣戲的前因後果邏輯關係大致是這樣的。

sentences.english: We need to understand the context in which these accidents occur.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須瞭解這些事故的前因後果。

sentences.english: German health authorities are currently investigating the circumstances around infection in the confirmed case.
sentences.chinese: 德國衛生當局目前正在調查確診病例感染的前因後果。

sentences.english: We should seek settlement in the context of that incident.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該根據這一事件的前因後果尋求解決辦法。

sentences.english: Cause and effect, or use FVF software for condition monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 的前因後果，或者利用FVF軟件進行條件監控。

definition: to go to jail/to be sent to prison
to die of illness or injury despite receiving medical help
old illness recurs (idiom); a relapse/fig. to repeat an old error/the same old problem
